Class AdamOptimizer<N extends NeuralNetwork>

java.lang.Object
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.optimizers.AdamOptimizer<N>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Optimizer<N>
@Strategy(CONCRETE) public class AdamOptimizer<N extends NeuralNetwork> extends Object implements Optimizer<N>
Adam optimizer (Kingma & Ba, 2014). Mirrors GradientDescent's training loop: we accumulate per-batch gradients, then apply Adam updates with bias correction.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer

    • optimize

      public void optimize(N neuralNetwork, DataSet trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective)
      Description copied from interface: Optimizer
      Optimizes the given estimation function based on the entire training set and the specified objective function.

      Typical implementations evaluate the ObjectiveFunction across the training set, compute gradients, and update the parameters of the estimation function accordingly.

      Specified by:
      optimize in interface Optimizer<N extends NeuralNetwork>
      Parameters:
      neuralNetwork - the estimation function (model) to optimize
      trainingSet - the dataset used for optimization
      objective - the objective function that defines the loss and gradients
